definitions.definition: A historical region of Northern Europe , located to the north of Saint Petersburg and politically split between Russia and Finland .
A republic and federal subject of Russia . Official name: Republic of Karelia . Capital: Petrozavodsk .

main_definition: A historical region of Northern Europe , located to the north of Saint Petersburg and politically split between Russia and Finland .
secondary_definitions: A republic and federal subject of Russia . Official name: Republic of Karelia . Capital: Petrozavodsk .
